divs: Sighting Details 1984 I was at the house, and hear a buzz from the invisible , became visible and solid it was a Spaceship from the civilization that I saw in 1983 at Mimai DIce,Miami Florida, they control earth and they have landing base in the pentagon, Nicaragua and Venezuela
